intro: Psychotria pullei, commonly known as the white psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white or pale pink flowers. It often grows in shaded, humid environments within the understory of forests. Psychotria pullei is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional healing practices.
